Adding Another Language (double click to read)
info:
To add a new language comnplete the following steps:
**Voice to text section:**
1. Copy and paste a new voice to text light green node, double click it, and switch to the desired language
2. Add another output to "Prepare Voice" function and connect it to the voice to text node and the voice node to the voice input link
**Text to voice section:**
3. Copy and paste new text translation nodes (blue) - the language to english and english to the language
4. Add another output to "Prepare Text" function and connect it to the translation nodes (all english to language nodes connect to the same point) and connect the translation nodes to the "Check Message ID" function and language to english node to the text to speech node
5. "Prepare Text" function needs to be fixed to work with the new total number of working languages and rewired
**Receive text to voice message section:**
6. Add another language identifier to the "Set Language" function
